quest.name: You've Got the Tatch
journal:
 Quest Sync
Mynes would be most obliged if you could make a delivery on his behalf.
objectives: Deliver the supply box to Teanna.

dialogue.name: MYNES
dialogue.text: I trust that you are ready to depart? My man Roi-Tatch has readied the supplies for delivery to the Imperative, so pray speak with him before you take to the road. Once again, you have my gratitude.

dialogue.name: MYNES
dialogue.text: Decided to sojourn with us a bit longer? I'm sure my men appreciate the company. At any rate, whenever you are ready to return to the Imperative, Roi-Tatch can furnish you with the supplies to be delivered.

dialogue.name: ROITATCH
dialogue.text: Oh, hello there. I take it you're the good-natured dupe─er, the kindly traveler who's agreed to lug this hefty crate of supplies all the way to the bleedin' Ostall Imperative. Well, here are the goods!

dialogue.name: ROITATCH
dialogue.text: Jests aside, you do us a great service. We were fortunate when a merchant caravan en route to Amh Araeng decided to sojourn here at the Round for a spell. We were able to restock all manner of supplies that we'd been short on for months.

dialogue.name: ROITATCH
dialogue.text: That's how the supply chain works in these parts: caravans pass through bound for far-flung locales, we restock supplies as best we can, and then we ship them out to outposts across Lakeland.

dialogue.name: ROITATCH
dialogue.text: 'Course, we don't always have enough free hands to make the deliveries. That's why we're most obliged to the kindness of strangers like yourself. Anyhow, I won't keep you any longer. Be safe on the road, friend.

dialogue.name: ROITATCH
dialogue.text: Decided to stay with us a while longer? If you like this dreary place so much, perhaps you'd be interested in trading places? Ahaha, but I jest─once again, much obliged for your help with the delivery, friend.

dialogue.name: TEANNA
dialogue.text: Ah, you're back, greenhorn. Hm? What's that you have with you?

dialogue.name: TEANNA
dialogue.text: A fresh crate of supplies! Perhaps you're not so useless after all! ...Actually, I have an apology to make. While you were away, my commanding officer informed me that not only are you not a greenhorn, you're not even a member of the guard.

dialogue.name: TEANNA
dialogue.text: I suppose I should have been able to tell by your...unconventional garb. Anyhow, rest assured that I got a good tongue-lashing for my presumptuousness. I won't let it happen again.

dialogue.name: TEANNA
dialogue.text: That said, I am most grateful for your service─you're a damn sight more useful than half of the men here. Perhaps you'd consider joining us someday? In the meantime, I've been instructed to pass along your reward. Don't be a stranger, now!
